mapper.insert: insert into cart(c_no, u_no, g_no) values(cart_c_no_seq.nextval, #{user.uNo}, #{game.gNo})
mapper.select: select g_name, g_short_desc, g_release_date, g_developer, g_distributor, g_price from cart c join game g on c.g_no=g.g_no where c.u_no=#{user.uNo}
